full_address: 2/1 South Sea Islander Way, Maroochydore, Qld 4558
description:
Located in arguably the most prime position in the SunCentral CBD in the heart of Maroochydore – the Sunshine Coast’s entertainment, commercial, and retail capital; is this stunning new terrace home, one of only six of its kind, in the sought-after Market Lane development.

Across three levels with genuine ground floor entry and branding exposure for a home business; it comprises four bedrooms, three fully tiled bathrooms, home office with powder room and kitchenette (ground floor), separate living areas, high-end kitchen, north-east facing private courtyard and upper deck, separate laundry, and secure two side-by-side covered carparks.

Designed to enable the resident(s) to live, work, and play at home – it is very much a design for our times - which could suit a variety of businesses from commercial, salon/beauty, health services, and creative, for example. The office has front entry from the street and can be shut off from back bedroom which also has its own entry.

Premium finishes and fixtures/fittings are showcased throughout including high ceilings, floating timber floors and timber-look tiles, ducted slimline air-conditioning, ceiling fans, 40mm stone benches in kitchen, Smeg appliances including induction cooktop, luxury standalone bathtub and dual vanities in master ensuite, LED lighting, and generous storage including under-stair.

‘The Terraces’ is part of the ‘Market Lane’ development – and residents have access to fabulous onsite facilities including 25-metre resort pool and BBQ area, along with private rooftop dining room and lounge bar on the 13th storey of Tower 1. Facilities and buildings are maintained by onsite management and there is 450m2 ground floor retail and dining to patronise.

‘Market Lane’ is the most exciting development of its kind in the CBD and sold out well before construction was complete; setting the standard for premium apartment living and design on the Sunshine Coast that has everyone talking!

This terrace home has never been lived in – is all shiny and new and is one of only six of this type of building in the Maroochydore CBD that offers ground floor commercial exposure. Whether purchasing to run a business and live in, or just live in and savour the cosmopolitan lifestyle of inner city living with the benefit of the Sunshine Coast climate, and close proximity to glorious beaches – this is the pinnacle of urban splendour, this is the future!

Contact today to express your interest, this is the FIRST time this property has hit the open market.

- Chic tri-level terrace home in Market Lane development
- Designed to blend work, rest, and play under one roof
- Genuine ground floor branding exposure from office
- 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 powder rooms, 2 living
- Private north-east facing courtyard & upper balcony
- High-end kitchen: stainless steel Smeg appliances
- Quality flooring, ducted A/C, ceiling fans, LED lights
- Side-by-side ground floor covered parking for 2 cars
- First class resort facilities, 25m lap pool, rooftop terrace
- Heart of CBD, footsteps to dining, retail, entertainment
- 20 min walk to Cotton Tree & Maroochydore Beach
- Only 6 in complex – brand new, 1st time to open market
